Output language for the AI assistant. The quality of translation may vary depending on the requested language and the model that is used.
ai_assist.case_manager.general.org_descr: ACME Corp. is a banking corporation present in every continent, that issues bank transfers for their customers and...
Description of the organization, as free text. This is used by the case review AI assistant to include the context of your organization when reviewing alerts.
ai_assist.case_manager.general.structure: The review should contain the following sections: ...

Desired output structure for AI case reviews, in <DocLink>Markdown format</DocLink>. This should only be used for basic formatting purposes, it is applied together with translation after the raw case review has been generated and validated.
ai_assist.case_manager.general.title: General
ai_assist.case_manager.kyc_enrichment_ca: Configure up to 10 domains to help enrich customer data. The agent can use these domains to search online and find relevant information about your customer.
ai_assist.case_manager.kyc_enrichment.cu: Provide guidelines or a preferred output format for KYC enrichmentâ€¦

Write instructions here for what sort of data you want to look for when enriching customer profiles with online search: nature of the information to search, desired output structure...
The instructions should be consistent with the search domain allowlist, if you have configured one below.
ai_assist.case_manager.kyc_enrichment.do: Please enter a valid domain, for example checkmarble.com
ai_assist.case_manager.kyc_enrichment.en: Enable the KYC enrichment feature. <bold>This feature calls external APIs that treat any data received in the United States.</bold>
